p: The estimated total population of Dominican Republic in 2015 was 9.98 million with the capital Santo Domingo accounting for around 27% or 2.65 million. In 2016, Santo Domingo received annual precipitation of 730mm with an average temperature of 27Â°C [ 10]. Aedes populations appear to be well established and contribute to endemic dengue transmission, although entomological surveys are unsystematically conducted, two to three times per year [ 11].
